# Summer 2025 Tech Internships by Pitt CSC & Simplify We're back! Use this repo to share and keep track of software, tech, CS, PM, quant internships for **Summer 2025**. The list is maintained collaboratively by the [Pitt Computer Science Club](https://pittcsc.org/) and [Simplify](https://simplify.jobs/)! :warning: Please note that this repository is exclusively for internships/co-ops in the United States, Canada, or Remote positions :earth_americas: 🧠 For valuable tips on navigating the internship process, be sure to check out our guide [Zero to Offer](https://www.pittcs.wiki/zero-to-offer) 🧠. 🙏 **Contribute by submitting an [issue](https://github.com/SimplifyJobs/Summer2024-Internships/issues/new/choose)! See the contribution guidelines [here](./CONTRIBUTING.md)!** 🙏 ---

😮‍💨 Tired of checking every day for new internships? 😩

A community member made ⬇️ SWE List ⬇️ that sends you email updates for this repo

Share any other cool projects you make using the repo, and we might give you a shoutout!

---

Applying to internships?
Autofill all your applications in a single click.

Stop manually re-entering your information. Simplify’s extension helps you autofill internship applications on millions of sites.
